H0.text: Probably best remembered as being chief presenter of ITV's News At Ten between 1976 and 1991which British journalist and broadcaster sadly passed away on July 20th 2012. Trevor McDonald

H1.text: Probably best remembered as being chief presenter of ITV's News At Ten between 1976 and 1991which British journalist and broadcaster sadly passed away on July 20th 2012. John Simpson

H2.text: Probably best remembered as being chief presenter of ITV's News At Ten between 1976 and 1991which British journalist and broadcaster sadly passed away on July 20th 2012. Jon Snow

H3.text: Probably best remembered as being chief presenter of ITV's News At Ten between 1976 and 1991which British journalist and broadcaster sadly passed away on July 20th 2012. Alastair Burnet

A4.text: In May 2021, McDonald co-presented a one-hour documentary called Trevor McDonald & Charlene White: Has George Floyd Changed Britain? with Charlene White.

A5.text: McDonald presented The Killing of PC Harper: A Wife's Story on 17 March 2022.
